```pddl
[
(:action catch
    :parameters (?player - agent ?entity - entity ?loc - location ?other_player - agent ?stone - stone)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?player ?loc) 
        (or 
            (and (at ?entity ?loc) (in_wild ?entity)) ; Catching wild entity
            (and (inventory ?other_player ?entity) (not (inventory ?player ?entity))) ; Trading entity
            (at ?stone ?loc) ; Finding stone
            (and (inventory ?player ?stone) (or (is_fire_stone ?stone) (is_ice_stone ?stone)) (inventory ?player ?entity)) ; Selecting stone for evolution
        )
    )
    :effect (and 
        (or 
            (and (inventory ?player ?entity) (not (in_wild ?entity)))
        )
    )
)

(:action wait 
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?process - process)
  :precondition (and (in_process ?entity ?process))
  :effect (and (completed ?entity ?process) (not (in_process ?entity ?process)))
)
]
```
